metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38858 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow viafunction mov_build_index() of libmpdemux/demux_mov.c. This affects mplayerSVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38858` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.2.1-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
mplayer - 2:1.2.1-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.2.1-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
mplayer2 - 2:1.2.1-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mplayer package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.2.1-1ubuntu1.1+esm1').
